english.segment1: Times are hard. Times have changed. Don't you say. But I keep holding on to you. It's hard to keep the faith alive day to day. Leaning on the strength I've found in you. You're the hope of all the Earth
english.segment2: You are my hope. You are my strength. You're everything. Everything I need. You are my hope. You are my life. You are my hope. You are my hope
english.segment3: Far beyond what I can see or comprehend. Etching your eternity in me. Nations stream and angels sing, "Jesus reigns". And every knee bows down. You're the hope of all the Earth
english.segment4: You are my hope. You are my strength. You're everything. Everything I need. You are my hope. You are my life. You are my hope. You are my hope
english.segment5: Carry on and I sing of how. You love and I love you now. All the times that I start to sink. You come and you rescue me. You are my hope. You are my hope
